articles.title: 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning deadline. What happens now?
articles.description:
Twelve towns failed to comply with the MBTA Communities Act by the end of 2025. Now they face legal threats, lost funding, and deep uncertainty.

The post 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning deadline. What happens now? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning
